fieldsToCompare.description: Fields in the input to add to the comparison
fieldsToCompare.title: Fields To Compare

fieldToSplitOut.description: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.
fieldToSplitOut.title: Fields To Split Out

anyOf.description: Fields in the input to exclude from the comparison
anyOf.title: Fields To Exclude

type.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
type.title: Type

aggregation.description: How to combine the values of the field you want to summarize
aggregation.title: Aggregation

anyOf.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize
anyOf.title: Field

anyOf.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize. The field should contain numerical values; null, undefined, empty strings would be ignored.
anyOf.title: Field

anyOf.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize; null, undefined, empty strings would be ignored
anyOf.title: Field

anyOf.description: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by
anyOf.title: Fields to Split By

anyOf.description: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by
anyOf.title: Fields to Group By

outputFieldName.description: The name of the field to put the aggregated data in. Leave blank to use the input field name.
outputFieldName.title: Output Field Name

renameField.description: Whether to give the field a different name in the output
renameField.title: Rename Field

fieldToAggregate.description: The name of a field in the input items to aggregate together
fieldToAggregate.title: Input Field Name

destinationFieldName.description: The name of the output field to put the data in
destinationFieldName.title: Put Output in Field

includeBinaries.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new item
includeBinaries.title: Include Binaries

keepOnlyUnique.description: Whether to keep only unique binaries by comparing mime types, file types, file sizes and file extensions
keepOnlyUnique.title: Keep Only Unique Binaries

keepMissing.description: Whether to add a null entry to the aggregated list when there is a missing or null value
keepMissing.title: Keep Missing And Null Values

mergeLists.description: Whether to merge the output into a single flat list (rather than a list of lists), if the field to aggregate is a list
mergeLists.title: Merge Lists

disableDotNotation.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
disableDotNotation.title: Disable Dot Notation

removeOtherFields.description: Whether to remove any fields that are not being compared. If disabled, will keep the values from the first of the duplicates.
removeOtherFields.title: Remove Other Fields

disableDotNotation.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
disableDotNotation.title: Disable Dot Notation

disableDotNotation.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
disableDotNotation.title: Disable Dot Notation

includeBinary.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new items
includeBinary.title: Include Binary

destinationFieldName.description: The field in the output under which to put the split field contents
destinationFieldName.title: Destination Field Name

disableDotNotation.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
disableDotNotation.title: Disable Dot Notation

skipEmptySplitFields.title: Ignore items without valid fields to group by
skipEmptySplitFields.displayName: Ignore items without valid fields to group by

disableDotNotation.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
disableDotNotation.title: Disable Dot Notation

anyOf.description: Fields in the input items to aggregate together
anyOf.title: Fields To Include

anyOf.description: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items
anyOf.title: Include

compare.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
compare.title: Compare

sortFieldsUi.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
sortFieldsUi.title: Fields To Sort By

keep.description: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending
keep.title: Keep

code.description: Javascript code to determine the order of any two items
code.title: Code

maxItems.description: If there are more items than this number, some are removed
maxItems.title: Max Items
